bookmarks.viewsWelcome.bookmarksExplorer:
In order to use Bookmarks, you have to open a folder or workspace first.
[Open a Folder](command:_bookmarks.openFolderWelcome)
[Open a Workspace](command:workbench.action.openWorkspace)
To learn more about how to use Bookmarks in VS Code [read the docs](http://github.com/alefragnani/vscode-bookmarks/#bookmarks).

No bookmarks yet.
In order to use Bookmarks, you have to open a file in the editor.
[Open a File](command:workbench.action.quickOpen)
To learn more about how to use Bookmarks in VS Code [read the docs](http://github.com/alefragnani/vscode-bookmarks/#bookmarks).

No bookmarks yet.
In order to use Bookmarks, place the cursor in any location in the file and run the command:
[Bookmarks: Toggle](command:bookmarks.toggle)
To learn more about how to use Bookmarks in VS Code [read the docs](http://github.com/alefragnani/vscode-bookmarks/#bookmarks).

bookmarks.configuration.title: Bookmarks
bookmarks.configuration.saveBookmarksInP: Allow bookmarks to be saved (and restored) locally in the opened Project/Folder instead of VS Code
bookmarks.configuration.gutterIconPath.d: Path to another image to be presented as Bookmark
bookmarks.configuration.backgroundLineCo: Background color of the decoration. Use rgba() and define transparent background colors to play well with other decorations. Ex.: rgba(21, 126, 251, 0.1)
bookmarks.configuration.navigateThroughA: Allow navigation look for bookmarks in all files in the project, instead of only the current
bookmarks.configuration.wrapNavigation.d: Allow navigation to wrap around at the first and last bookmarks in scope (current file or all files)
bookmarks.configuration.useWorkaroundFor: Use a workaround for formatters like Prettier, which does not notify on document changes and messes Bookmark's Sticky behavior
bookmarks.configuration.experimental.ena: Experimental. Enables the new Sticky engine with support for Formatters, improved source change detections and undo operations
bookmarks.configuration.showNoMoreBookma: Specifies whether a notification will be shown when attempting to navigate between bookmarks when no more exist.
bookmarks.configuration.showCommandsInCo: Specifies whether Bookmarks commands are displayed on the context menu
bookmarks.configuration.sidebar.expanded: Specifies whether the Side Bar show be displayed expanded
bookmarks.configuration.multicursor.togg: Specifies how multi cursor handles already bookmarked lines
Creates bookmarks in all selected lines at once, if at least one of the lines don't have a bookmark
Literally toggles a bookmark in each line, instead of making all lines equal
bookmarks.configuration.label.suggestion: Specifies how labels are suggested when creating bookmarks
Use the selected text (if available) directly, no confirmation required
Suggests the selected text (if available). You still need to confirm.
Suggests the selected text (if available) or the entire line (when has no selection). You still need to confirm.
bookmarks.colors.lineBackground.descript: Background color for the bookmarked line
bookmarks.colors.lineBorder.description: Background color for the border around the bookmarked line
bookmarks.colors.overviewRuler.descripti: Overview ruler marker color for bookmarks
